Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3854 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-3854 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 16.2.10-3, affected by CVE-2022-3854
